languages.text: "Законы миров смерти порой имеют удивительные отличия. Но для родины Космических волков сам Император велел установить особые порядки... неподвластные пониманию обычных людей".

"The laws of death worlds can be surprisingly unique at times. But for the home of the Space Wolves, the Emperor Himself commanded that special customs be established... ones that may be beyond the understanding of ordinary people."
languages.original_text: "Законы миров смерти порой имеют удивительные отличия. Но для родины Космических волков сам Император велел установить особые порядки... неподвластные пониманию обычных людей".

traits.locale_text: "The laws of death worlds can sometimes be surprisingly different. But for the home of Space Wolves, the Emperor Himself commanded that special customs be established... which may be beyond ordinary people's understanding."

"The laws of death worlds can be surprisingly unique at times. But for the home of the Space Wolves, the Emperor Himself commanded that special customs be established... ones that may be beyond the understanding of ordinary people."

languages.text: “死亡世界的律法有时可能会与众不同。不过，那里毕竟是太空野狼的故乡，是帝皇亲自下令创立那些特别的习俗……或许，这确实超出了常人的理解。”
languages.original_text: "The laws of death worlds can be surprisingly unique at times. But for the home of the Space Wolves, the Emperor Himself commanded that special customs be established... ones that may be beyond the understanding of ordinary people."

traits.locale_text: “死亡世界的律法有时可能会与众不同。不过，那里毕竟是太空野狼的故乡，是帝皇亲自下令创立那些特别的习俗……或许，这确实超出了常人的理解。”

languages.text: «Las leyes de los mundos letales son sorprendentemente diferentes en ocasiones. Para el mundo natal de los Lobos Espaciales, el mismísimo Emperador ordenó la creación de costumbres especiales... que tal vez escapen a la comprensión de la gente corriente».
languages.original_text: "The laws of death worlds can be surprisingly unique at times. But for the home of the Space Wolves, the Emperor Himself commanded that special customs be established... ones that may be beyond the understanding of ordinary people."

traits.locale_text: «Las leyes de los mundos letales son sorprendentemente diferentes en ocasiones. Para el mundo natal de los Lobos Espaciales, el mismísimo Emperador ordenó la creación de costumbres especiales... que tal vez escapen a la comprensión de la gente corriente».

languages.text: « Les lois des mondes hostiles sont parfois étonnamment uniques. Mais dans le cas de la planète des Space Wolves, c'est l'Empereur Lui-même qui a fait mettre en place des coutumes spécifiques... dont la compréhension est susceptible d'échapper aux gens ordinaires. »
languages.original_text: "The laws of death worlds can be surprisingly unique at times. But for the home of the Space Wolves, the Emperor Himself commanded that special customs be established... ones that may be beyond the understanding of ordinary people."

traits.locale_text: « Les lois des mondes hostiles sont parfois étonnamment uniques. Mais dans le cas de la planète des Space Wolves, c'est l'Empereur Lui-même qui a fait mettre en place des coutumes spécifiques... dont la compréhension est susceptible d'échapper aux gens ordinaires. »

languages.text: 「死地惑星の法は時に驚くほど独特なものです。ですがスペースウルフの故郷に関しては、皇帝陛下ご自身が特別な慣習を定めるようお命じになりました…それは普通の人々の理解を超えるかもしれないものです」
languages.original_text: "The laws of death worlds can be surprisingly unique at times. But for the home of the Space Wolves, the Emperor Himself commanded that special customs be established... ones that may be beyond the understanding of ordinary people."

traits.locale_text: 「死地惑星の法は時に驚くほど独特なものです。ですがスペースウルフの故郷に関しては、皇帝陛下ご自身が特別な慣習を定めるようお命じになりました…それは普通の人々の理解を超えるかもしれないものです」

languages.text: "Ölüm dünyalarının yasaları bazen şaşırtıcı derecede eşsiz olabilir. Ancak Uzay Kurtları'nın ana dünyası için İmparator Hazretleri özel gelenekler oluşturulmasını emretti... Sıradan insanların anlayışının ötesinde olabilecek gelenekler."
languages.original_text: "The laws of death worlds can be surprisingly unique at times. But for the home of the Space Wolves, the Emperor Himself commanded that special customs be established... ones that may be beyond the understanding of ordinary people."

traits.locale_text: "Ölüm dünyalarının yasaları bazen şaşırtıcı derecede eşsiz olabilir. Ancak Uzay Kurtları'nın ana dünyası için İmparator Hazretleri özel gelenekler oluşturulmasını emretti... Sıradan insanların anlayışının ötesinde olabilecek gelenekler."

languages.text: "Die Gesetze von Todeswelten können bisweilen überraschend einzigartig sein. Aber für die Heimat der Space Wolves hat der Imperator selbst befohlen, dass besondere Bräuche eingeführt werden ... und diese können gewöhnliche Menschen möglicherweise nicht verstehen."
languages.original_text: "The laws of death worlds can be surprisingly unique at times. But for the home of the Space Wolves, the Emperor Himself commanded that special customs be established... ones that may be beyond the understanding of ordinary people."

traits.locale_text: "Die Gesetze von Todeswelten können bisweilen überraschend einzigartig sein. Aber für die Heimat der Space Wolves hat der Imperator selbst befohlen, dass besondere Bräuche eingeführt werden ... und diese können gewöhnliche Menschen möglicherweise nicht verstehen."
